title: Couldn't tele in...?
body:
I couldn't tele into Ascencion using 4, somehow it was glitched out I suppose. I attempted closing the client and reconnecting to the game, but to no avail it still didn't work; so I was stuck trying to assist in pinging for the team the whole game.

Despite such, after the game is finished.. Ohh, I've been put into lower priority matchmaking for 5 games for 20 minutes.. Really, from a glitch? This is unacceptable

replies.body: Was the keystroke not being recognized or were you simply having issues selecting a teleport location on the map?
